forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 20C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 68F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 51F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 23C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 73F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 61F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High near 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 61F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
